title: Ergo Platform and C#
summary: The document provides an overview of the resources available for C# developers interested in integrating with the Ergo Platform. It highlights a comprehensive tutorial series on interacting with the Ergo Blockchain using C#, as well as an open-source project called FleetSharp, which simplifies the process of converting data between compatible formats for communication and storage. The document encourages developers with C# experience or those interested in learning more about Ergo integration to contribute to the FleetSharp project and to reach out to the Ergo community for support.

qa_pairs.question: What is the Ergo Platform?
qa_pairs.answer: The Ergo Platform is a blockchain platform.

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of the FleetSharp project?
qa_pairs.answer: FleetSharp is an open-source project that simplifies the process of converting data between compatible formats for communication and storage on the Ergo Blockchain.

qa_pairs.question: What programming language is used in the Ergo with C# 101 tutorial series?
qa_pairs.answer: The Ergo with C# 101 tutorial series uses the C# programming language.

qa_pairs.question: Where can developers find support for integrating with the Ergo Blockchain using C#?
qa_pairs.answer: Developers can join the Ergo community's `#development` Discord channel to receive support from seasoned Ergo developers and community members.

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of the ErgoTree serializer/deserializer in the FleetSharp project?
qa_pairs.answer: The ErgoTree serializer/deserializer in the FleetSharp project simplifies the process of converting data between compatible formats for communication and storage on the Ergo Blockchain.

sections.heading: Ergo Platform and C#
sections.content: While C# resources for integrating with Ergo may be limited, there are several valuable resources that developers can utilize.

sections.heading: Tutorial Series
sections.content: A comprehensive tutorial series, [Ergo with C# 101](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aUuki-fAxwc&list=PLUWruihtE-HtL-JZk8Vb4Yn_H18aE3rb6), is available on YouTube. This series offers a detailed guide on how to interact with the Ergo Blockchain using C#.

sections.heading: FleetSharp
sections.content:
[FleetSharp](fleetsharp.md) is an ongoing open-source project. It is a sigma-type ([ErgoTree](ergotree.md)) [serializer/deserializer](ergotree.md#serialization) based on [Fleet](fleet.md). This tool simplifies the process of converting [data](data-model.md) between compatible formats for [communication](p2p-protocol-overview.md) and [storage](storage-rent.md).

As an open-source project, FleetSharp thrives on community contributions. Developers with C# experience or those interested in learning more about Ergo integration are encouraged to contribute.

If you encounter any issues or require more detailed instructions, don't hesitate to reach out to the Ergo community. Join our [`#development` Discord channel](https://discord.gg/kj7s7nb) to receive support from seasoned Ergo developers and community members.
